content.rendered:
Mobile Banking

Banking On the Go with the StarConnect Plus Mobile App

Our mobile banking app makes it simple to check your account any time. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your money is always at your fingertips. You can conveniently:

  • Check your balances
  • Transfer money between your Westamerica accounts
  • Pay your bills with our optional Bill Pay service
  • Monitor your transactions
  • Deposit checks
  • Set Alerts for activity such as large withdrawal amounts, low funds notifications and weekly balance updates.

After you download the app, simply use the same login and password you have for your StarConnect Plus™ account and start enjoying the freedom of banking from your mobile device. Westamerica gives you the freedom to manage your money wherever you go.

Not a StarConnect Plus user? Enroll today!
